prodNameC: 潘爾登革熱免疫球蛋白M診斷試劑
ingredientsDesc:
1. Anti-human IgM Coated Microwells - Microwells are coated with anti-human IgM antibodies. (12x8 wells).  
2. Dengue 1-4 Antigens(Recombinant)-One clear capped vial, 150 µl concentrated dengue viral antigens 1, 2, 3 and 4.  
3. Wash Buffer Concentrate - One bottle, 60 ml of 20x concentrate of phosphate buffered saline (pH 7.2-7.6) with Tween 20 and preservative (0.1% Proclin).  
4. Serum Diluent - Two bottles 50 ml. Tris buffered saline (pH 7.2-7.6) with preservatives (0.1% Proclin™) and additives. 
5. Antigen Diluent – One bottle, 50 ml. Phosphate Buffer containing preservatives (0.1% Proclin and 0.005% gentamycin).  
6. HRP Conjugated Monoclonal Antibody Tracer - One bottle, 7 ml. Horseradish peroxidase conjugated monoclonal antibody tracer with preservative (0.1% Proclin) and protein stabilisers.  
7. Tetramethylbenzidine TMB - One bottle 15 ml. A mixture of 3,3,5,5-tetramethylbenzidine and hydrogen peroxide in a citric-acid citrate buffer (pH 3.5-3.8). 
8. IgM Positive Control Serum - One Bla
applicantAddr: 臺北市內湖區內湖路二段三九七號二樓
efficacy: 定性偵測人體血清中的登革熱病毒IgM抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.0002 登革熱病毒血清試劑

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 116 LUTWYCHE ROAD, WINDSOR BRISBANE 4030, QUEENSLAND, AUSTRALIA
